IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: PROVIDE HOUSING AND SERVICES TO SIOUXLAND'S ELDERLY IN A WAY THAT INSURES A PHYSICAL AND CARE ENVIRONMENT WHICH MAXIMIZES THE DIGNITY AND INDEPENDENCE OF EACH RESIDENT.

IRS990.Description: PROVIDED SKILLED NURSING AND NURSING FACILITY LEVELS OF CARE FOR APPROXIMATELY 31,710 BED DAYS; PROVIDED 116 INDEPENDENT LIVING UNITS THAT OPERATE AT NEAR 100% CAPACITY

CONSTRUCTION OF A 62-UNIT INDEPENDENT LIVING BUILDING

Form990ScheduleKPartV.Identifier: SCHEDULE K, PART II, LINE 3, COLUMN (A)
Form990ScheduleKPartV.ReturnReference: EXPLANATION FOR DIFFERENCE BETWEEN BOND PRICE AND PROCEEDS OF BOND ISSUE:
Form990ScheduleKPartV.Explanation: THE TOTAL AMOUNT OF PROCEEDS OF THE BOND ISSUE HAS BEEN REDUCED BY PREPAYMENT OF INTEREST EXPENSE IN THE TOTAL AMOUNT OF $221,987.

Form990ScheduleKPartV.Identifier: SCHEDULE K, PART II, LINE 3, COLUMN (B)
Form990ScheduleKPartV.ReturnReference: EXPLANATION FOR DIFFERENCE BETWEEN BOND PRICE AND PROCEEDS OF BOND ISSUE:
Form990ScheduleKPartV.Explanation: THE TOTAL AMOUNT OF PROCEEDS OF BOND ISSUE HAS BEEN REDUCED BY PREPAYMENT OF INTEREST EXPENSE IN THE TOTAL AMOUNT OF $640,776 AND THE RETURN OF UNSPENT PROCEEDS IN THE TOTAL AMOUNT OF $25,190.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE FINANCE COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD WILL REVIEW THE 990 BEFORE IT IS SUBMITTED.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: DIRECTORS RECEIVE A COPY OF THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY EACH YEAR. DIRECTORS ARE REQUIRED TO CERTIFY THAT THEY HAVE RECEIVED A COPY AND THAT THEY HAVE READ, UNDERSTAND AND AGREE WITH THE POLICY.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS REVIEWS WAGE & BENEFIT SURVEYS PREPARED BY AN INDEPENDENT ORGANIZATION, NOTING SALARY RANGES FOR SIMILAR SIZED ORGANIZATIONS & DETERMINES WAGES TO BE OFFERED TO EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR & ADMINISTRATOR. THIS DECISION IS REVIEWED BY THE FULL BOARD OF DIRECTORS AND APPROVED.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 18
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: FORM 990 AND SUPPORTING DOCUMENTS ARE AVAILABLE FROM THE ORGANIZATION UPON REQUEST. ADDITIONALLY, A PUBLIC WEBSITE CALLED GUIDESTAR MAKES CERTAIN PARTS OF THE 990 AVAILABLE TO THE GENERAL PUBLIC.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE GOVERNING DOCUMENTS ALONG WITH THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE TO INTERESTED PARTIES UPON REQUEST FROM THE BUSINESS OFFICE OF SUNRISE RETIREMENT COMMUNITY.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: CHANGES IN NET ASSETS OR FUND BALANCES:

GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS IS RESPONSIBLE FOR OVERSIGHT OF THE AUDIT OF THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND ARE RESPONSIBLE FOR SELECTING AN INDEPENDENT AUDITOR. THE PROCESS IS UNCHANGED FROM PRIOR YEARS.
